formattedAddress: 360 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 360 E 116th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: Whether I go pick up food at the store or order delivery, the food is always made to order and piping hot when I get it home. Some of the best Chinese food. I‚Äôd say not to judge their storefront by how it looks. The food is always good. Very nice people. It takes a minute to cook the food when you walk in and order, so be patient. Glad I stumbled on this spot when I moved to East Harlem. It‚Äôs a fave and I‚Äôm loyal to it forever üôåüèΩ

originalText.text:
The food we ate was good however the driver who delivered our order, who we are assuming is the owner as he refused to let us speak to anyone else in regards to this issue, accused us of paying with counterfeit money an hour and a half after after we had received our order.

He decided that the best way to correct this mistake was to loudly bang on our apartment door after dark for several minutes without saying who he was. When we confronted him at the store he claimed that he had delivered to two other addresses after us, and when we asked why he was claiming that the counterfeit money came from us he switched his story and claimed that business was so slow that he didn‚Äôt have any other deliveries than us.

When we asked why he was banging so loudly and violently at the door an hour and a half after he had delivered he said that he thought we didn‚Äôt hear him when we didn‚Äôt answer because we thought a crazy person was outside trying to break into the apartment.

When we asked why he didn‚Äôt check the money when we handed it to him, he claimed he trusted us to pay him properly. We will not be ordering from this place moving forward.

Anyone ordering deliveries from this place please be careful!!! The driver lacks common sense and will not call or text if there are any issues. He will instead take matters into his own hands and approach you personally on his own.

Edit: this incident happened over a $20 dollar bill. Ridiculous behavior over a situation that could‚Äôve been handled easily if he had chosen to actually call and talk to us.

originalText.text: It‚Äôs a small space that can easily get crowded with just four people inside the waiting area. Definitely go when there isn‚Äôt many people ordering or you‚Äôll be waiting be a while. Prices are decent and the owner is nice, it‚Äôs just two people; a guy in the back that cooks and a woman that takes the orders. It can take a while to get your order depending on how many orders they have considering the obvious short staff which I don‚Äôt think they will ever change. I usually get the lunch special and it‚Äôs around $8-9. I would usually order the chicken broccoli or the beef lo mein and it‚Äôs been delicious every time. Definitely a takeout only place, I don‚Äôt think the space would be ideal to eat any packed meals maybe a small bite or drink.

originalText.text: Delivery guy is CRAZY. 1 hr passes after my delivery is completed and he returns to my apartment banging on my door and accusing me of giving him fake money. He yells at me to go downstairs and pay him again- which I DO- but he‚Äôs not even there. I WALK to the STORE and ask him how he even knows that it‚Äôs the money I used that‚Äôs counterfeit. He says he just does bc there wasn‚Äôt a lot of business. Sure. I pay him 20 AGAIN and never got an apology from him for banging on my door like a CRAZY PERSON for 10 minutes straight. There are other Chinese spots here in East Harlem, ones that wont harass you without any cause. Wont waste my business here anymore.

originalText.text: The food is always as I ask.. I love the food here. Takes a bit long on delivery but it's all good cause the food is always hot ,fresh,and prepared how I like.
